tool_description:
Best Instagram Scraper API 2024 
● Launched in May 2023 
● 100% real-time data, no cache, advanced profile, bulk likes, hidden insights & more. 
● Priority Support (t.me/mrngstar_rapid)
name: Instagram API 2023
title: Instagram API 2023

api_list.name: Location Stories
api_list.description:
Get stories of specific location from `location_id`. 

You can use `Get place ids from city names` endpoint to get location_id from city names.

**Refer either reels or reels_media from response.**

required_parameters.name: location_id
required_parameters.description: Location Id

api_list.name: Location posts
api_list.description:
Get posts from `location_id`. 
You can use previous endpoint to get location_id from city names. Use `pk` from previous endpoint response as `location_id`

required_parameters.name: location_id
required_parameters.description: Use previous endpoint to get `location_id` from city names. Use `pk` from previous endpoint response as `location_id` here.

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `next_max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Nearby locations by latitude & longitude
api_list.description:
Get nearby places from coordinates. You can use these place ids to get posts/reels  of that location using location posts endpoint.

Use Postman to get very accurate lat and lng from response.
**Example**.  Postman response shows lat=18.9301600000000007639755494892597198486328125 but on RapidAPI it shows only 18.930

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude

api_list.name: Audio(Music) Reels
api_list.description: Audio Reels by Audio ID

required_parameters.name: audio_id
required_parameters.description: Audio ID in numeric format.

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `next_max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Search Music(Audio)
api_list.description: Search music using string. You can use any language as string.

required_parameters.name: string
required_parameters.description: Use can put any language string to search music.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/search_music/bones"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/search_music/{string}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Hashtag Posts
api_list.description: Get posts by hashtag. You can use any language as hashtag ex. भारत

required_parameters.name: hashtag
required_parameters.description:
Use can put any language hashtag. 
*If you want to search hashtags for given string then please use previous endpoint.*

required_parameters.name: feed_type
required_parameters.description: feed_type should be **recent** or **top**

optional_parameters.name: next_page
optional_parameters.description: Please pass `next_page` only if feed_type is **top**. Keep empty for first pagination request.

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `next_max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Search Hashtags
api_list.description: Search hashtags using string. You can use any language as string for ex. 민지.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get user reels by user_id
api_list.description: Get reels of an Instagram user using username.

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Get child comments by media_id and comment_id
api_list.description:
Get child comments of post/reel/igtv/etc using media_id and comment_id.
You can pass `next_min_child_cursor` from response to `min_id` for next child comments.

Please make sure you don't add `/` at the end of url.

optional_parameters.name: min_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `min_id` empty for first request then provide `next_min_child_cursor ` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Get active, archived stories of user by date wise using user_id
api_list.description:
Get active. archived stories of a user by date wise using user_id.
Main feature of this endpoint is to get active stories & highlight stories date wise.
**Note**: archived stories are stories which are present in highlights.

optional_parameters.name: end_cursor
optional_parameters.description: Leave `end_cursor` empty for first request then provide `end_cursor` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Get like details of any media by media id
api_list.description:
Get all users who liked a particular post/reel/IGTV/etc using media_id.
You can fetch upto 9000 users(upto 5MB of response). Please make sure your systems are capable of handling too much data otherwise you can use 1000 count value.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description:
By default you will get 100 users data. 
1 < count < 9000

api_list.name: Get comments by media_id
api_list.description: Get comments of post/reel/igtv/etc using media_id

optional_parameters.name: min_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `min_id` empty for first request then provide `next_min_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Get like details of any media by shortcode
api_list.description:
Get all users who liked a particular post/reel/IGTV/etc using shortcode.
You can fetch upto 9000 users(upto 5MB of response). Please make sure your systems are capable of handling too much data otherwise you can use 1000 count value.

required_parameters.name: shortcode
required_parameters.description:
**How to find shortcode?**
www.instagram.com/p/CrgVBtHr3DP/ here **CrgVBtHr3DP** is shortcode.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description:
By default you will get 100 users data. 
1 < count < 9000

api_list.name: Get User Country (About this account)
api_list.description:
**User country from About this account.**

```
User country, Date joined and former usernames details
```

**Account based in:** This is the country location based on the account's activity. This helps people understand if the account is accurately representing their location on Instagram.


https://help.instagram.com/697961817256175

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: Instagram user_id(pk)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/get_user_country/6242874774"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/get_user_info/28247116907"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/get_user_info/{user_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get user followers by user_id - Web Version
api_list.description:
Get followers of an Instagram user using user_id.
You can scrape multiple followers of verified accounts(more than 100).

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description:
**Optional**
Count should be between 1-50.  Default value is 50.

optional_parameters.name: end_cursor
optional_parameters.description: Leave `end_cursor ` empty for first request then provide `end_cursor ` received from previous request to get more followers.

api_list.name: Follower Insights

api_list.name: Get insights of post/reel by shortcode
api_list.description: Get hidden insights such as `save_count`, `share_count` of any post, reel using shortcode.  You can find more details [here(tutorial).](https://rapidapi.com/mrngstar/api/instagram-api-20231/tutorials/hidden-insights-of-public-posts,-reels)

required_parameters.name: shortcode
required_parameters.description:
**How to find shortcode?**
www.instagram.com/reel/CrgVBtHr3DP/ here **CrgVBtHr3DP** is shortcode.

api_list.name: Get user posts by username
api_list.description:
Get posts of an Instagram user using username.
*For fast response, we suggest you to use previous endpoint.*

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: number of posts

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `next_max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Get comments of media by shortcode
api_list.description: Get comments of post/reel/igtv/etc using shortcode

optional_parameters.name: min_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `min_id` empty for first request then provide `next_min_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Get user tags posts by user_id
api_list.description:
Get user tag posts of an Instagram user using user_id.
User tag posts can be found at www. instagram .com/{username}/tagged/

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `next_max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Get user followings by user_id
api_list.description: Get followings of an Instagram user using user_id.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description:
**Optional**
Count should be between 1-100. If not we will use the default value.

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `next_max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: User ID(pk) to Username - Fast Response
api_list.description: Fetch username & other basic details by using user_id(pk).

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: Instagram user_id(pk)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/get_username/8663171404"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
